verses.kjv: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, and Timotheus our brother,
verses.ct: From Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by God's will, and from Timothy our brother —

verses.kjv: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: To God's holy and faithful brothers and sisters in Christ at Colosse: May grace and peace be yours from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,
verses.ct: Whenever we pray for you, we thank God, the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.kjv: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love which ye have to all the saints,
verses.ct: because we've heard about your faith in Christ Jesus and the love you show to all of God's people,

verses.kjv: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel;
verses.ct: both of which spring from the hope stored up for you in heaven. You first learned about this hope through the true message of the gospel

verses.kjv: Which is come unto you, as it is in all the world; and bringeth forth fruit, as it doth also in you, since the day ye heard of it, and knew the grace of God in truth:
verses.ct: that reached you. This same gospel is spreading and producing results throughout the entire world, just as it has been doing among you ever since the day you heard it and truly grasped God's grace.

verses.kjv: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant, who is for you a faithful minister of Christ;
verses.ct: You learned all of this from Epaphras, our dear fellow servant, who faithfully serves Christ on your behalf.

verses.kjv: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit.
verses.ct: He's the one who told us about the love that the Spirit has produced in you.

verses.kjv: For this cause we also, since the day we heard it, do not cease to pray for you, and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding;
verses.ct: That's why, from the very day we heard about you, we haven't stopped praying for you. We ask God to fill you with the knowledge of his will through every kind of spiritual wisdom and insight,

verses.kjv: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing, being fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;
verses.ct: so that you would live in a way that honors the Lord and pleases him completely — producing results through every kind of good work and growing deeper in your knowledge of God,

verses.kjv: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;
verses.ct: being empowered with all the strength that comes from his magnificent power, so that you can endure anything with patience and perseverance, and even do it joyfully,

verses.kjv: Giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light:
verses.ct: while thanking the Father, who has qualified you to share in the inheritance that belongs to his people in the light.

verses.kjv: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son:
verses.ct: He rescued us from the domain of darkness and transferred us into the kingdom of his beloved Son,

verses.kjv: In whom we have redemption through his blood, even the forgiveness of sins:
verses.ct: in whom we have redemption through his blood — the forgiveness of sins.

verses.kjv: Who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature:
verses.ct: The Son is the visible representation of the invisible God, the firstborn over all creation.

verses.kjv: For by him were all things created, that are in heaven, and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether they be thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers: all things were created by him, and for him:
verses.ct: Through him everything was created — things in heaven and on earth, what can be seen and what cannot, whether thrones or ruling powers or authorities of any kind. Everything was created through him and for him.

verses.kjv: And he is before all things, and by him all things consist.
verses.ct: He existed before anything else, and he holds everything together.

verses.kjv: And he is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all things he might have the preeminence.
verses.ct: He is the head of the body, which is the church. He is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead, so that he would hold first place in absolutely everything.

verses.kjv: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell;
verses.ct: God was pleased to have all his fullness reside in the Son,

verses.kjv: And, having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself; by him, I say, whether they be things in earth, or things in heaven.
verses.ct: and through him to bring everything back into harmony with himself by establishing peace through the blood shed on the cross — whether things on earth or things in heaven.

verses.kjv: And you, that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled
verses.ct: There was a time when you were cut off from God and hostile toward him in your thinking because of your evil actions.

verses.kjv: In the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight:
verses.ct: But now he has brought you back to himself through Christ's physical body and his death, in order to present you as holy, without fault, and beyond accusation in his presence —

verses.kjv: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard, and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven; whereof I Paul am made a minister;
verses.ct: as long as you remain firmly rooted and established in the faith, not drifting away from the hope that the gospel gives you. This is the gospel that has been proclaimed to every person under heaven, and I, Paul, have become its servant.

verses.kjv: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you, and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body’s sake, which is the church:
verses.ct: Right now I actually find joy in what I suffer for your sake. In my own body I am completing what still remains of Christ's afflictions for the benefit of his body, which is the church.

verses.kjv: Whereof I am made a minister, according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you, to fulfil the word of God;
verses.ct: I became a servant of the church through the responsibility God gave me for your benefit — to fully carry out God's message,

verses.kjv: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations, but now is made manifest to his saints:
verses.ct: the mystery that was kept hidden throughout past ages and generations but has now been revealed to his people.

verses.kjv: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles; which is Christ in you, the hope of glory:
verses.ct: God chose to make known to them the magnificent richness of this mystery among the Gentiles, which is this: Christ living in you, the hope of glory.

verses.kjv: Whom we preach, warning every man, and teaching every man in all wisdom; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus:
verses.ct: He is the one we proclaim, cautioning everyone and instructing everyone with complete wisdom, so that we can present every person fully mature in Christ Jesus.

verses.kjv: Whereunto I also labour, striving according to his working, which worketh in me mightily.
verses.ct: This is what I work and struggle for, drawing on his powerful energy that is actively at work within me.
